alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 4:51PM EDT until May 03 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lancaster County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Chesterfield County in central South Carolina... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 450 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elgin, or 7 miles east of Lancaster, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Pageland, Elgin, Buford, Taxahaw, High Point Fire Station, Tradesville, Antioch, Bear Creek Park, Kirk Air Base, Forty Acre Rock Preserve and Camp Creek Fire Station. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
